snippet: Felix Investments and SharesPost are expected to face the first legal actions taken by the agency since it started its investigation into the trading of shares in privately held companies.
abstract: Felix Investments and SharesPost are expected to face the first legal actions taken by the agency since it started its investigation into the trading of shares in privately held companies.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and EVELYN M. RUSLI

headline.main: S.E.C. Close to Bringing Cases on 2 Brokerage Firms
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Query Closes In On 2 Brokerage Firms
